L

LANGUAGE - Static variable in class Main
Utility object for managing the language setting of this program.
language - Variable in class old.OldMain
Utility object for managing the language setting of this program.
Language - Class in util
A wrapper class to allow multiple GUI classes to share a ResourceBundle that contains the program's language file.
Language() - Constructor for class util.Language
Creates a ResourceBundle set to the default language text properties file.
Language.LanguageHolder - Class in util
Holder class to allow for a thread-safe lazy Singleton instantiation of the Language instance.
LanguageHolder() - Constructor for class old.OldLanguage.LanguageHolder
 
LanguageHolder() - Constructor for class util.Language.LanguageHolder
 
linkToUserProperties(Properties) - Method in class old.OldLanguage
Links this class to the program's user properties file and sets the Locale based on the user-defined setting in that file.
listSubControllerList - Variable in class controller.AbstractMasterController
A list of sub-controllers that manage the ListModels for JList GUI objects.
loadDefaultProperties() - Static method in class Main
Loads the default properties file as a resource stream from the classloader.
loadDefaultProperties() - Method in class old.OldMain
Load the DefaultProperties for this program.
loadUserProperties() - Static method in class Main
 
loadUserProperties() - Method in class old.OldMain
Load the UserProperties for this program.
localeText - Variable in class old.OldLanguage
A tool to provide translated Strings wherever they are needed in the program.
localeText - Variable in class util.Language
A tool to provide translated Strings wherever they are needed in the program.
log(Level, String, String, String) - Method in class old.ProgramLogger
Helper method to pass logging data to the shared Logger instance.
log(Level, String, String, String, Object) - Method in class old.ProgramLogger
Helper method to pass logging data to the shared Logger instance if the data has a parameter to record.
log(Level, String, String, String, Object[]) - Method in class old.ProgramLogger
Helper method to pass logging data to the shared Logger instance if the data has multiple parameters to record.
log(Level, String, String, String, Throwable) - Method in class old.ProgramLogger
Helper method to pass logging data to the shared Logger instance if an Exception was thrown.
LOG_DIRECTORY - Static variable in class Main
Constant value for the file path of the log directory of the program.
LOGGER - Static variable in class Main
The logger for this program.
LOGGER - Variable in class old.OldLanguage
The shared reference to the logger for this program.
LOGGER - Variable in class old.OldMain
Shared logger for the program.
LOGGER - Variable in class old.ProgramLogger
The logger object shared to all classes in this program.
LOGGER - Static variable in class util.Language
The Logger for this class.
LoggerFormat - Class in util
The format for all log entries for the ProgramLogger.
LoggerFormat() - Constructor for class util.LoggerFormat
 
LoggerHolder() - Constructor for class old.ProgramLogger.LoggerHolder
 
loggingWontSavePopup() - Static method in class Main
If the logger's FileHandler fails to properly initialize (most likely due to an IOException), this popup appears to warn the user that Debugging Mode will not work.

Because this message can appear so early in the program, it is locked as English-Only because the user will not have had an opportunity to set an alternate language yet.
